name: Beginnings
description:
Here you can find explanations for some of the more intricate parts of the ''starting'' progression; if you want to see what you're able or supposed to do next, check out Bee Angry-er Advancements (keybind: $(k:key.advancements)).
It is recommended to acquaint oneself with at least $(l:beginnings/garden_of_glass)this entry/$.
